data.name: CreateDebtAdjustment1
CreateDebtAdjustment2
CreateDebtDetailStatusHistory
CreateObligationTransactionRln
ReadAccrualInstructions
data.value: select top(1) OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, DISCONTINUE_DT from CKT_ACCRUAL_INSTR where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE)

data.name: ReadCashReceiptEventCashReceiptSourceTypeCashReceiptType
data.value: select top(1) CST_IDENTIFIER, CREVENT_ID, cast(@crtIdentifier as smallint) from CKT_CR_EVENT where (CREVENT_ID = @creventId) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier)

data.name: ReadCollection1
data.value: select top(1) sum(OB_TRN_AMT) from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (DIST_MTD = 'A') and (ADJ_IND = 'N')

data.name: ReadCollection2
data.value: select top(1) sum(OB_TRN_AMT) from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (DIST_MTD = 'M') and (ADJ_IND = 'N')

data.name: ReadCollection3
data.value: select top(1) sum(OB_TRN_AMT) from CKT_COLLECTION where (ADJ_IND = 'N') and (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (DIST_MTD = 'P')

data.name: ReadCollection4
data.value: select COLL_ID, APPLIED_TO_CD, COLL_DT, DISB_DT, ADJ_IND, CONCURRENT_IND, DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, COLL_ADJ_DT, COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, OB_TRN_AMT, DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, DIST_MTD, PGM_APPLD_TO, APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, CRT_NOTICE_REQ_IND, CRT_NOTICE_PROC_DT, AE_NOTIFIED_DT, OCSE34_RPT_PERIOD, MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT, COL_ADJ_RSN_TXT, CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (DIST_MTD = 'A') and (ADJ_IND = 'N')

data.name: ReadCollection5
data.value: select COLL_ID, APPLIED_TO_CD, COLL_DT, DISB_DT, ADJ_IND, CONCURRENT_IND, DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, COLL_ADJ_DT, COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, OB_TRN_AMT, DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, DIST_MTD, PGM_APPLD_TO, APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, CRT_NOTICE_REQ_IND, CRT_NOTICE_PROC_DT, AE_NOTIFIED_DT, OCSE34_RPT_PERIOD, MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT, COL_ADJ_RSN_TXT, CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (DIST_MTD = 'W') and (ADJ_IND = 'N')

data.name: ReadCollection6
data.value: select COLL_ID, APPLIED_TO_CD, COLL_DT, DISB_DT, ADJ_IND, CONCURRENT_IND, DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, COLL_ADJ_DT, COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, OB_TRN_AMT, DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, DIST_MTD, PGM_APPLD_TO, APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, CRT_NOTICE_REQ_IND, CRT_NOTICE_PROC_DT, AE_NOTIFIED_DT, OCSE34_RPT_PERIOD, MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT, COL_ADJ_RSN_TXT, CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (DIST_MTD in ('A', 'P')) and (ADJ_IND = 'N')

data.name: ReadCollection7
data.value: select distinct T1.COLL_ID, T1.APPLIED_TO_CD, T1.COLL_DT, T1.DISB_DT, T1.ADJ_IND, T1.CONCURRENT_IND, T1.DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T1.CRT_TYPE, T1.CST_ID, T1.CRV_ID, T1.CRD_ID, T1.OBG_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_ID, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.OTY_ID, T1.COLL_ADJ_DT, T1.COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T1.CREATED_BY, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T1.OB_TRN_AMT, T1.DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, T1.DIST_MTD, T1.PGM_APPLD_TO, T1.APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, T1.CRT_NOTICE_REQ_IND, T1.CRT_NOTICE_PROC_DT, T1.AE_NOTIFIED_DT, T1.OCSE34_RPT_PERIOD, T1.MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT, T1.COL_ADJ_RSN_TXT, T1.CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO from CKT_OB_TRN T2 join CKT_COLLECTION T1 on (@crdId = T1.CRD_ID) and (@crvId = T1.CRV_ID) and (@cstId = T1.CST_ID) and (@crtType = T1.CRT_TYPE) and (T2.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_ID) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_ID) and (@otyType = T2.OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE is not null) and (@cspSupNumber = T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER) and (T1.ADJ_IND = 'N') and (T1.DIST_MTD = 'A')

data.name: ReadCollection8
data.value: select COLL_ID, APPLIED_TO_CD, COLL_DT, DISB_DT, ADJ_IND, CONCURRENT_IND, DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, COLL_ADJ_DT, COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, OB_TRN_AMT, DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, DIST_MTD, PGM_APPLD_TO, APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, CRT_NOTICE_REQ_IND, CRT_NOTICE_PROC_DT, AE_NOTIFIED_DT, OCSE34_RPT_PERIOD, MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT, COL_ADJ_RSN_TXT, CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO from CKT_COLLECTION where (@crdId = CRD_ID) and (@crvId = CRV_ID) and (@cstId = CST_ID) and (@crtType = CRT_TYPE) and (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (ADJ_IND = 'N') and (DIST_MTD = 'A')

data.name: ReadCollectionCashReceiptDetail
data.value: select COLL_ID, APPLIED_TO_CD, COLL_DT, DISB_DT, ADJ_IND, CONCURRENT_IND, DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CRT_TYPE, CST_ID, CRV_ID, CRD_ID, OBG_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_ID, OTR_TYPE, OTY_ID, COLL_ADJ_DT, COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, OB_TRN_AMT, DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, DIST_MTD, PGM_APPLD_TO, APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, CRT_NOTICE_REQ_IND, CRT_NOTICE_PROC_DT, AE_NOTIFIED_DT, OCSE34_RPT_PERIOD, MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT, COL_ADJ_RSN_TXT, CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO from CKT_COLLECTION where (@otyId = OTY_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (DIST_MTD = 'A') and (ADJ_IND = 'N') order by CRD_ID

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadDebtAdjustment
data.value: select top(1) T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OB_TRN_ID, T1.OB_TRN_TYP, T1.OB_TRN_AMT, T1.DEBT_ADJ_TYP, T1.DEB_ADJ_DT, T1.CREATED_BY, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.DEBT_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T1.DA_CA_PROC_REQ_IND, T1.LAP_ID, T1.REVERSE_CLCTNS_IND from CKT_OB_TRN T1 join CKT_OB_TRN_RLN T2 on (T1.OTY_TYPE = T2.OTY_TYPE_SECONDARY) and (T1.OB_TRN_TYP = T2.OTR_TYPE) and (T1.OB_TRN_ID = T2.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@otyTypePrimary = T2.OTY_TYPE_PRIMARY) and (@otrPType = T2.OTR_P_TYPE) and (@otrPGeneratedId = T2.OTR_P_GENERATED_ID) and (@cpaPType = T2.CPA_P_TYPE) and (@cspPNumber = T2.CSP_P_NUMBER) and (@obgPGeneratedId = T2.OBG_P_GENERATED_ID) and ( T2.ONR_GENERATED_ID in (cast(@systemGeneratedIdentifier1 as smallint), cast(@systemGeneratedIdentifier2 as smallint), cast(@systemGeneratedIdentifier3 as smallint), cast(@systemGeneratedIdentifier4 as smallint)) ) and (T1.DEB_ADJ_DT = @debAdjDt)

data.name: ReadDebtDetail1
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, OTR_TYPE, DUE_DT, BAL_DUE_AMT, INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, ADC_DT, RETIRED_DT, CVRD_PRD_START_DT, CVD_PRD_END_DT, PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY from CKT_DEBT_DTL where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (@otrGeneratedId = OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER)

data.name: ReadDebtDetail2
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, OTR_TYPE, BAL_DUE_AMT, RETIRED_DT from CKT_DEBT_DTL where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (RETIRED_DT = @retiredDt)

data.name: ReadDebtDetailStatusHistory
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_STAT_HST_ID, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, OTR_TYPE, OTR_ID, CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OBG_ID, OB_TRN_ST_CD, OTY_TYPE, RSN_TXT from CKT_DBT_DT_STS_HIS where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (DISCONTINUE_DT = @discontinueDt)

data.name: ReadLegalActionPerson
data.value: select top(1) LA_PERSON_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS where LA_PERSON_ID = @laPersonId

data.name: ReadObligCollProtectionHist1
data.value: select top(1) T1.CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT, T1.CVRD_COLL_END_DT, T1.DEACTIVATION_DATE, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTY_IDENTIFIER, T1.OBG_IDENTIFIER from CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST T1 join CKT_OBG_RLN T3 on (T1.OTY_IDENTIFIER = T3.OTY_FIRST_ID) and (T1.OBG_IDENTIFIER = T3.OBG_F_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_F_NUMBER) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_F_TYPE) and (@otySecondId = T3.OTY_SECOND_ID) and (@obgGeneratedId = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (T1.DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate) and (T1.CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT <= @cvrdCollStrtDt) and (T1.CVRD_COLL_END_DT >= @cvrdCollStrtDt)

data.name: ReadObligCollProtectionHist2
data.value: select top(1) CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT, CVRD_COLL_END_DT, DEACTIVATION_DATE, CREATED_TMST, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTY_IDENTIFIER, OBG_IDENTIFIER from CKT_OB_COLL_PHIST where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@obgIdentifier = OBG_IDENTIFIER) and (@otyIdentifier = OTY_IDENTIFIER) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (DEACTIVATION_DATE = @deactivationDate) and (CVRD_COLL_STRT_DT <= @cvrdCollStrtDt) and (CVRD_COLL_END_DT >= @cvrdCollStrtDt)

data.name: ReadObligation1
data.value: select top(1) T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID from CKT_OBLIGATION T1 join CKT_OBG_RLN T2 on (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T2.OTY_FIRST_ID) and (T1.OB_ID = T2.OBG_F_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_F_NUMBER) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_F_TYPE) and (@otySecondId = T2.OTY_SECOND_ID) and (@obgGeneratedId = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = T2.CPA_TYPE)

data.name: ReadObligation2
data.value: select top(1) T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID from CKT_OBLIGATION T1 join CKT_OBG_RLN T2 on (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T2.OTY_SECOND_ID) and (T1.OB_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (@otyFirstId = T2.OTY_FIRST_ID) and (@obgFGeneratedId = T2.OBG_F_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspFNumber = T2.CSP_F_NUMBER) and (@cpaFType = T2.CPA_F_TYPE)

data.name: ReadObligationDebtDebtDetail
data.value: select top(1) T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.PRIM_SEC_CD, T1.ORD_TYP_CD, T2.OB_TRN_ID, T2.OB_TRN_TYP, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T2.LAP_ID, T3.DUE_DT, T3.BAL_DUE_AMT, T3.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, T3.ADC_DT, T3.RETIRED_DT, T3.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T3.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T3.PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD, T3.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T3.LAST_UPDATED_BY from CKT_OBLIGATION T1 join CKT_OB_TRN T2 on (@dtyGeneratedId = T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.OB_ID = @obId) and (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T2.OTY_TYPE) and (T1.OB_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = @obTrnId) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) join CKT_DEBT_DTL T3 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T3.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T3.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T3.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_NUMBER)

data.name: ReadObligationTransactionRlnRsn
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID from CKT_OB_TRN_RLN_RSN where OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID = @obTrnRlnRsnId

data.name: ReadObligationTransactionRlnRsnDebtAdjustment
data.value: select T3.ONR_GENERATED_ID, T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T2.CSP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_TYPE, T2.OB_TRN_ID, T2.OB_TRN_TYP, T2.OB_TRN_AMT, T2.DEBT_ADJ_TYP, T2.DEB_ADJ_DT, T2.CREATED_BY, T2.CREATED_TMST, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T2.OTY_TYPE, T2.DEBT_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T2.DA_CA_PROC_REQ_IND, T2.LAP_ID, T2.REVERSE_CLCTNS_IND from CKT_OB_TRN T2 join CKT_OB_TRN_RLN T3 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T3.OTY_TYPE_SECONDARY) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T3.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T3.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@otyTypePrimary = T3.OTY_TYPE_PRIMARY) and (@otrPType = T3.OTR_P_TYPE) and (@otrPGeneratedId = T3.OTR_P_GENERATED_ID) and (@cpaPType = T3.CPA_P_TYPE) and (@cspPNumber = T3.CSP_P_NUMBER) and (@obgPGeneratedId = T3.OBG_P_GENERATED_ID) order by T2.CREATED_TMST desc

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CLASS, SUP_PRSN_REQ_IND from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId

data.name: UpdateCollection1
data.value: update CKT_COLLECTION set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, DIST_MTD = @distMtd, MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT = @mnlDistRsnTxt where (COLL_ID = @collId) and (CRT_TYPE = @crtType) and (CST_ID = @cstId) and (CRV_ID = @crvId) and (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (OBG_ID = @obgId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_ID = @otrId) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType) and (OTY_ID = @otyId)

data.name: UpdateCollection2
data.value: update CKT_COLLECTION set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, DIST_MTD = @distMtd, MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT = @mnlDistRsnTxt where (COLL_ID = @collId) and (CRT_TYPE = @crtType) and (CST_ID = @cstId) and (CRV_ID = @crvId) and (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (OBG_ID = @obgId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_ID = @otrId) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType) and (OTY_ID = @otyId)

data.name: UpdateCollection3
data.value: update CKT_COLLECTION set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, DIST_MTD = @distMtd, MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT = @mnlDistRsnTxt where (COLL_ID = @collId) and (CRT_TYPE = @crtType) and (CST_ID = @cstId) and (CRV_ID = @crvId) and (CRD_ID = @crdId) and (OBG_ID = @obgId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_ID = @otrId) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType) and (OTY_ID = @otyId)

data.name: UpdateDebtDetail
data.value: update CKT_DEBT_DTL set BAL_DUE_AMT = @balDueAmt, RETIRED_DT = @retiredDt, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy where (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_GENERATED_ID = @otrGeneratedId) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType)

data.name: UpdateDebtDetailStatusHistory
data.value: update CKT_DBT_DT_STS_HIS set DISCONTINUE_DT = @discontinueDt, RSN_TXT = @rsnTxt where (OB_TRN_STAT_HST_ID = @obTrnStatHstId) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType) and (OTR_ID = @otrId) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OBG_ID = @obgId) and (OB_TRN_ST_CD = @obTrnStCd) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType)
